description: Number of ordered multigraphs on n labeled edges (without loops).
references: G. Labelle, Counting enriched multigraphs..., Discrete Math., 217 (2000), 237-248.
G. Paquin, Dénombrement de multigraphes enrichis, Mémoire, Math. Dept., Univ. Québec à Montréal, 2004.
formula: E.g.f.: exp((3*x-2)/(2-2*x))*Sum(1/(n!*(1-x)^binomial(n, 2)), n = 0 .. infinity). a(n) = Sum((-1)^(n-k)*Stirling1(n, k)*A020554(k), k=0..n). - _Vladeta Jovovic_, May 02 2004E.g.f.: exp(x/(2-2*x))*Sum(A020556(n)*(-log(1-x)/2)^n/n!, n=0..infinity). - _Vladeta Jovovic_, May 02 2004
author: Gilbert Labelle (gilbert(AT)lacim.uqam.ca), _Simon Plouffe_
